mapper.insert: insert into member ( email, pwd, nick, name, tel, pstno, base_addr, detail_addr, jno, bank, account, profile, token, status ) values ( #{email}, sha2(#{password},256), #{nickname}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{postNo}, #{baseAddr}, #{detailAddr}, #{jobNo}, #{bank}, #{account}, 'profile1.png', #{token}, #{status} );
mapper.select: select mno, name, email, cdt from member where name=#{name} AND email=#{email};
mapper.update: update member set pwd=sha2(#{password},256) where mno=#{no} AND name=#{name} AND email=#{email}
mapper.select: select mno, name, email, cdt, nick, profile from member where mno=#{value}
select mno, email, nick, name, tel, cdt, pstno, base_addr, detail_addr, jno, bank, account, profile, status from member order by mno;
select mno, email, pwd from member where email=#{email} and pwd=sha2(#{password},256)
select email from member where email=#{email}
select nick from member where nick=#{nickname}
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, pwd=sha2(#{password},256) where mno=#{no}
